instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dust and dirt, and all possible contaminants.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
instructions.data: Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ B‑701 or BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ B‑105 Topcoat (2 coats): BOYSEN®® Cool Shades™

calculator.title: Primer
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Latex Flat Latex B‑701
calculator.note: Other option for primer: BOYSEN®® EcoPrimer™ B‑105
